name: PeekingIterator_removeTest
description: Unit tests for the remove functionality of the PeekingIterator class.

test_cases.name: testRemoveWithoutPeekOrElement
test_cases.description: Tests the remove functionality of the PeekingIterator when called after next() but not after peek() or element().

test_cases.name: testRemoveAfterPeek
test_cases.description: Tests the remove functionality of the PeekingIterator when called after peek(), expecting an IllegalStateException.

test_cases.name: testRemoveAfterElement
test_cases.description: Tests the remove functionality of the PeekingIterator when called after element(), expecting an IllegalStateException.

test_cases.name: testRemoveOnEmptyIterator
test_cases.description: Tests the remove functionality of the PeekingIterator when called on an empty iterator, expecting an IllegalStateException.
